obfuscation: ﻿ My strengths and weaknesses in the English language Ten days after finishing high school , I am now to study English again .
original: ﻿ My strengths and weaknesses in the English language  Ten years after finishing high school, I am now to study English again.

obfuscation: This time on a much eminent level .
original: This time on a much higher level.

obfuscation: It is time to evaluate what my strengths and weaknesses are .
original: It is time to evaluate what my strengths and weaknesses are.

obfuscation: Listening In general I 'm a full listener .
original: Listening In general I'm a good listener.

obfuscation: For instance , while listening to a lecturer , I do n't have a problem to focus on what is being said ( unless the person I 'm listening to causes the subject really boring , or when I 'm very tired ) , and I usually understand the lot .
original: For instance, while listening to a lecturer, I don't have a problem to focus on what is being said (unless the person I'm listening to makes the subject really boring, or when I'm very tired), and I usually understand the lot.

obfuscation: My weakness is my minor vocabulary .
original: My weakness is my small vocabulary.

obfuscation: I think I scored about average on the diagnostic test I took on vocabulary .
original: I think I scored about average on the diagnostic test I took on vocabulary.

obfuscation: Since I did a lot of guessing , picking away the right words , it is reasonable to assume that my vocabulary is even below average .
original: Since I did a lot of guessing, picking out the right words, it is reasonable to assume that my vocabulary is even below average.

obfuscation: I love watching English movies and I pick up on the language just by listening to it when I make the effort not to look at the subtitles .
original: I enjoy watching English movies and I pick up on the language just by listening to it when I make the effort not to look at the subtitles.

obfuscation: And of course by reading , which is what the adjacent part in this essay is about .
original: And of course by reading, which is what the next part in this essay is about.

obfuscation: Reading I like to take novels for the fun of it , but also other sorts of literature about various kinds of matters .
original: Reading I like to read novels for the fun of it, but also other sorts of literature about various kinds of matters.

obfuscation: Therefore I believe the literature class and the social studies will be easier for me than other courses .
original: Therefore I believe the literature course and the social studies will be easier for me than other courses.

obfuscation: My weakness in this class is , once again , my lack of vocabulary .
original: My weakness in this course is, once again, my lack of vocabulary.

obfuscation: It slows down my reading a great deal , but the pace will increase the more I understand , as well as my vocabulary .
original: It slows down my reading a great deal, but the pace will increase the more I read, as well as my vocabulary.

obfuscation: I think I 'm fairly full when it comes to interpreting novels , short stories and poems .
original: I think I'm fairly good when it comes to interpreting novels, short stories and poems.

obfuscation: My strengths are the fact that I love reading and that I usually understand the content , irony and humour .
original: My strengths are the fact that I enjoy reading and that I usually understand the content, irony and humour.

obfuscation: Speaking y strength when it comes to speaking English is that I 'm not afraid to make mistakes .
original: Speaking y strength when it comes to speaking English is that I'm not afraid to make mistakes.

obfuscation: I 'm here to learn and of course I 'm not perfect from the beginning .
original: I'm here to learn and of course I'm not perfect from the start.

obfuscation: furthermore , I believe that my speaking ability will improve rather quickly once I start practising on a daily basis .
original: Moreover, I believe that my speaking ability will improve rather quickly once I start practising on a daily basis.

obfuscation: I find the rhythm of the language and the accent , more unmanageable to learn than the pronunciation is .
original: I find the rhythm of the language and the accent, more difficult to learn than the pronunciation is.

obfuscation: I am very rusty though , I have n't spoken English since high school , like I said , and then it was almost just about answering questions .
original: I am very rusty though, I haven't spoken English since high school, like I said, and then it was almost just about answering questions.

obfuscation: The trouble is that there is a limitation to what I can talk about with my present vocabulary , and that I do n't have the right intonation .
original: The problem is that there is a limitation to what I can talk about with my present vocabulary, and that I don't have the right intonation.

obfuscation: Writing y writing skills are very unmanageable to evaluate ; I do n't really know what my strengths and weaknesses are .
original: Writing y writing skills are very difficult to evaluate; I don't really know what my strengths and weaknesses are.

obfuscation: I know that I ca n't be that full at it , since my vocabulary is limited and my knowledge in grammar is bad .
original: I know that I can't be that good at it, since my vocabulary is limited and my knowledge in grammar is bad.

obfuscation: I remember that grammar is very tricky , it is probably my number one weakness .
original: I think that grammar is very tricky, it is probably my number one weakness.

obfuscation: I have some advantage though , since I studied Swedish grammar last year .
original: I have some advantage though, since I studied Swedish grammar last year.

obfuscation: My ability to focus on a subject is fairly full , but it can become better .
original: My ability to focus on a subject is fairly good, but it can become better.

obfuscation: I 've written a lot in Swedish and maybe that is also an advantage to some extent .
original: I've written a lot in Swedish and maybe that is also an advantage to some extent.

obfuscation: I find it rather difficult to write this essay and I imagine it will be even harder when I get an intricate subject to write about .
original: I find it rather difficult to write this essay and I imagine it will be even harder when I have an intricate subject to write about.

obfuscation: My strength would be my ambition to learn and trying to get it properly .
original: My strength would be my ambition to learn and trying to get it right.

obfuscation: Conlusion To bring this essay to an end , I will nowadays summarise my different strengths and weaknesses in the English language .
original: Conlusion To bring this essay to an end, I will now summarise my different strengths and weaknesses in the English language.

obfuscation: My lack of vocabulary has a damaging effect on all parts of the language .
original: My lack of vocabulary has a negative effect on all parts of the language.

obfuscation: My difficulty with grammar naturally has a damaging effect when it comes to writing and in some ways speaking .
original: My difficulty with grammar naturally has a negative effect when it comes to writing and in some ways speaking.

obfuscation: ( Needless to say it will give me a lot of study at the grammar course ) .
original: (Needless to say it will give me a lot of work at the grammar course).

obfuscation: I am not accustomed to speaking English , which of course will make it unmanageable from the beginning .
original: I am not accustomed to speaking English, which of course will make it difficult from the beginning.

obfuscation: My strengths are my faculty to learn languages and my ambition to do thus .
original: My strengths are my faculty to learn languages and my ambition to do so.

obfuscation: I hope that I will be able to transfer my writing skills in Swedish to my writing in English .
original: I hope that I will be able to transfer my writing skills in Swedish to my writing in English.

obfuscation: My interest in reading will help me through the continuous study increasing my vocabulary , as my general interest in English will help me through all courses .
original: My interest in reading will help me through the continuous work increasing my vocabulary, as my general interest in English will help me through all courses.
